question.name: id
question.description:
Find a gene by gene symbol, Entrez Gene, or Ensembl Gene ID.

Searches on gene symbol are case-sensitive and against official symbols only (no synonyms).
question.summary: Find a gene by official gene symbol, Entrez Gene, or Ensembl Gene ID.

question.name: upload
question.description:
Upload a list of genes.

Accepted identifiers: Entrez (NCBI) Gene, Ensembl, MGI, HGNC, UCSC, or official gene symbol (case-sensitive).

question.name: keyword
question.description:
Find a gene by free text search against gene symbols, synonyms, and products.

Search is not case-sensitive and matches exact phrases, unless wild card '*' or boolean 'OR' are specified.

Examples:
  • zinc finger
  • zinc OR finger
  • cytokine
  • cyto\*
  • kin\*as\*
question.summary: Find a gene by free text search against gene symbols, synonyms, and products.

question.name: go
question.description:
Retrieve a list of one or more genes annotated by the selected Gene Ontology (GO) terms.

Start typing to view and select from a list of suggestions or enter an asterisk (*) to perform a keyword search (e.g., transcription factor*).
question.summary: Get genes annotated by a specific GO term.
